name: Pipe connect
description:
Pipe connect is a game based on an old puzzle where the player must arrange small
blocks with numbers on a small board.
In this game the player will find several pipes that must be assembled in the correct way.
There is always an empty block and the player clicks on the piece it automatically moves
to this block, there is also a pressure switch that serves to limit the game.
The game currently has 20 levels and depending on player acceptance, new levels can be created.
